file_content.text: You're strong to have made it this far. But not strong enough.
I am more than Sith, now. Much more.
He's tall. I'll give him that.
Lord Sadic = Power Guard? // Jedi = be careful
Remarkable technology. So versatile. I just calculated seventeen different ways to end your life.
Calculate all you want, Sith. The Force is with me.
That won't be enough.
The Force. Is that all?
Only a madman would sacrifice his own humanity for power.
You're sick.
No price is too high to become war incarnate.
All that hardware won't save you from me.
I'll only need one for you.
I've run the numbers. You overestimate your chances.
A shame you'll never understand what true power feels like. Perhaps I'll add you to my army, after all. Darth Angral would appreciate that.
No. We'll kill you first.
Agent Galen. Still functional. Let me rectify that.
Control factor ten initiated....
Aaaaah!
Obey me--or I'll tear your mind apart.
You're in control, Galen. Not him. He has no power over you.
Fight back, agent.
I have all the power. I am power.
Not anymore. Never again.
I'm with you, Jedi. Let's finish this.
Stop! It's me you want, Sadic.
Leave him alone!
Control factor twenty initiated....
Aaaaah!
That's for my friends!
Jedi... let's destroy this thing.
Keep him busy, agent. I'll do the rest.
Enough. [Attack Sadic]
I might even leave your mind intact, as I did Agent Galen's.
I'll never serve you--and you'll never hurt anyone again.
Your evil ends now.
You're mistaken.
This is your last chance. Give up now.
Surrender or die, Sith.
Only the weak offer surrender as an option. I am not weak.
Prepare to become scrap metal, you twisted freak.
Time for you to die. [Attack]
We've been waiting for you, Jedi.
Darth Angral told me you defeated Watcher One and Inquisitor Ferav. Impressive.
Explains why you're not here. Scared, huh?
Darth Angral has promised great rewards to whoever kills you.
If he gives you anything, you should delouse it first.
You soldiers--lay down your weapons. I promise you'll be treated fairly.
It's over, Imperials. Give up.
More than you deserve.
We're not here to banter, Kira.
Enough jokes.
Not even a little?
Even my Padawan is laughing at you.
We're not scared of you, Sith.
You must be so embarrassed.
When my men failed to report from the Nikto Sector, I knew it had to be your doing.
You killed good men at that recruitment center. Loyal soldiers. The best.
They gave me no choice. I'd rather have captured them alive.
I'm sorry for their deaths.
Typical Jedi. Slaughter a roomful of men, and then apologize for it.
They served evil. The galaxy won't miss them.
Cold-blooded killers.
No one will miss you, either.
If they were any good at their jobs, they'd still be alive.
No, the worst--incompetent.
For that, you die slowly.
I promised Commander Graul he could execute you personally--and I left him a few gifts to help.
Mark One Power Guards. Not as destructive as the later models I possess, but quick to assemble and quite malleable.
It took nothing to wipe their useless minds and program them to serve me.
You twisted... what have you done to these people?
You monster.
Perfected them. What good is a weapon you can't control?
You'd have made a good slave, but I have all I need.
They were only aliens. Not as if their minds mattered.
You captured a Republic agent. What have you done with him?
Where is Agent Galen?
Something extraordinary--but you won't live to see it.
Kill the Jedi. Cut out the Padawan's tongue and bring it to me.
Goodbye, Jedi.
If those people are already dead, at least I won't have to hold back.
Good to know. [Attack.]
How unfortunate you chose to aid the Jedi. It's your last mistake.
